means: 到达，来( arrive的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The first plane-loads of food, children's clothing and medical supplies began arriving.
sentence.Network_cn: 首批飞机运送的食物、儿童衣物和药品开始抵达。

sentence.Network_en: He hanged himself two hours after arriving at a mental hospital.
sentence.Network_cn: 在到精神病医院两小时后他就上吊自杀了。

sentence.Network_en: Any entry arriving after the closing date will not be considered.
sentence.Network_cn: 截止日期之后报名参赛的人将不予考虑。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语_百度知道 ... harm 没有任何害处 arriving 一到 celebrate 庆祝.
my friends are arriving tomorrow morning ., 我朋友明天早晨到达这里.
The train towards World Park arriving , please passengers exit first ., 往世界公园方向的列车即将进站 , 请先让车上乘客下车.
party A shall arrange production on deposit sent & confirmed , and shipping date shall be within reasonable days after the deposit arriving .甲方将在定金汇出并确认后安排生产，并在定金到账后合理之期限内装船发货。

list.abs: 七年级英语单词表 ... hungry 饥饿的 arrive 到达;抵达 way 路;路线;路途.
(A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... arrival n. 到达；到来；到达者 arrive vi. 到达；来临；达到 arrow n. 箭；箭状物.
普吉岛中英泰常用词汇对照表（非常实用） ... 出口 exit;out;way out 进站(进港、到达) arrivals 不需报关 nothing to declare.
(A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... arrest vt. 逮捕，拘留；阻止 arrival n. 到达；到来；到达者 arrive vi. 到达；来临；达到.
(A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... arrest vt. 逮捕，拘留；阻止 arrival n. 到达；到来；到达者 arrive vi. 到达；来临；达到.
it was fortunate for her that the policeman arrived at that moment ., 她很幸运 , 警察在那时赶到了.

entry.def: When a person or vehicle arrives at a place, they come to it at the end of a journey.

example.ex: ...a small group of commuters waiting for their train, which arrived on time...
example.tran: 几个通勤者等候的列车按时到达了

entry.def: When you arrive at a place, you come to it for the first time in order to stay, live, or work there.

example.ex: ...in the old days before the European settlers arrived in the country.
example.tran: 在欧洲殖民者来到这个国家之前的旧日时光

example.ex: ...a young student newly arrived in England from New Zealand.
example.tran: 从新西兰初次来到英格兰的年轻学生

entry.def: When something such as letter or meal arrives, it is brought or delivered to you.

example.ex: Any entry arriving after the closing date will not be considered...
example.tran: 截止日期之后报名参赛的人将不予考虑。

example.ex: Breakfast arrived while he was in the bathroom.
example.tran: 早餐送来的时候他还在浴室里。

entry.tran: （新产品或发明）出现，到来，问世
entry.def: When something such as a new product or invention arrives, it becomes available.

example.ex: Several long-awaited videos will finally arrive in the shops this month...
example.tran: 几部让人翘首企盼的录像片终于将在这个月到货。

example.ex: They'll be ready to embrace the new technology when it arrives.
example.tran: 他们随时准备迎接新技术的问世。

entry.tran: （尤指经过等待或期盼后）来临，到来
entry.def: When a particular moment or event arrives, it happens, especially after you have been waiting for it or expecting it.

example.ex: The time has arrived when I need to give up smoking.
...the belief that the army would be much further forward before winter arrived.
example.tran: 认为军队在冬季来临之前将会向前大举推进的看法

entry.def: When you arrive at something such as a decision, you decide something after thinking about it or discussing it.

example.ex: ...if the jury cannot arrive at a unanimous decision...
example.tran: 如果陪审团不能作出一致判决

example.ex: These figures are arrived at on the basis of dentists' receipts for 1991-1992.
example.tran: 这些数字是根据1991至1992年间的牙医收据统计得出的。

entry.def: When a baby arrives, it is born.

example.ex: It's very unlikely that your baby will arrive before you get to hospital.
example.tran: 你的孩子不大可能在你到达医院之前就出生。

entry.def: If you say that someone has arrived, you mean that they have become successful or famous.

example.ex: These are cars which show you've arrived and had a good time along the way.
example.tran: 这样的车可以显示你已功成名就，并且一路顺风顺水。

means.word_mean: 1. directed or moving inward or toward a center;

auth_sentence.content: But still people are arriving in pretty bad shape.
auth_sentence.res_content: But still people are arriving in pretty bad shape.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But still people are arriving in pretty bad shape.

auth_sentence.content: We are arriving at the core of the problem.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are arriving at the core of the problem.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are arriving at the core of the problem.

auth_sentence.content: We will not consider applications arriving after the deadline.
auth_sentence.res_content: We will not consider applications arriving after the deadline.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We will not consider applications arriving after the deadline.

Sentence.sentence: Each of the 300 arriving ninth graders are randomly(随机地) assigned to one of the houses.
